law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 534, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 477, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 441, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(3). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 10.
